turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a order to pick up a coffee from the Starbucks in Key Largo, Florida on US one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, one moment, let me find that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, got it! What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cafe americano with extra sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti Caffè Americano, with extra sugar. did you want any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sure! anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, put some whip cream on the caffè Americano, whip cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! give me a moment to send that one over to your selected store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
